short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracking the Number of Active cases,Recoveries,Deaths,Confirmed cases

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you to figure out the current pandemic situation around the World by letting you to know the number of active Covid cases , Deaths and Recoveries.
And also you can know the cases in the respective country .

Features : 
1)Simple Design
2)User Friendly
3)Map included
4)A drop down box for selecting a respective country

More features coming soon.......‚úå
